Greetings, I'm Aditya Dahiya. By day, I wrangle bureaucracy, but by night, I'm the data wizard conjuring up visual delights and diving deep into health data science. This website is my gallery of creations. So, channel your inner Sherlock and embark on an adventure of discovery! Here are some of my works:

1.  [FaNoOp](https://aditya-dahiya.github.io/FaNoOp/) (**Facts! Not Opinions!**) - my un-opinionated blog on insights from publicly available data.

2.  [Presentations](https://aditya-dahiya.github.io/projects_presentations/presentations.html) and **some interesting [Projects](https://aditya-dahiya.github.io/projects_presentations/projects.html)** created by me for random assignments and talks.
